trans-unit.source: Sets the text drawing flags for the toolbar

seg-source.mrk: Sets the text drawing flags for the toolbar

target.mrk: Sets the text drawing flags for the toolbar

trans-unit.source: One or more of the DT_ flags, specified in DrawText, that indicate which bits in $iDTFlags will be used when drawing the text.

seg-source.mrk: One or more of the DT_ flags, specified in DrawText, that indicate which bits in $iDTFlags will be used when drawing the text.

target.mrk: One or more of the DT_ flags, specified in DrawText, that indicate which bits in $iDTFlags will be used when drawing the text.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the DT_ flags, specified in DrawText, that indicate how the button text will be drawn. This value will be passed to the DrawText API when the button text is drawn.

seg-source.mrk: One or more of the DT_ flags, specified in DrawText, that indicate how the button text will be drawn.
This value will be passed to the DrawText API when the button text is drawn.

target.mrk: One or more of the DT_ flags, specified in DrawText, that indicate how the button text will be drawn.
This value will be passed to the DrawText API when the button text is drawn.

trans-unit.source: Returns the previous text drawing flags.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the previous text drawing flags.

target.mrk: Returns the previous text drawing flags.

trans-unit.source: The $iMask parameter allows you to specify which flags will be used when drawing the text, even if these flags are turned off.

seg-source.mrk: The $iMask parameter allows you to specify which flags will be used when drawing the text, even if these flags are turned off.

target.mrk: The $iMask parameter allows you to specify which flags will be used when drawing the text, even if these flags are turned off.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you don't want the $DT_CENTER flag used when drawing text you would add the $DT_CENTER flag to $iMask and not specify the $DT_CENTER flag in $iDTFlags.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if you don't want the $DT_CENTER flag used when drawing text you would add the $DT_CENTER flag to $iMask and not specify the $DT_CENTER flag in $iDTFlags.

target.mrk: For example, if you don't want the $DT_CENTER flag used when drawing text you would add the $DT_CENTER flag to $iMask and not specify the $DT_CENTER flag in $iDTFlags.

trans-unit.source: This prevents the control from passing the $DT_CENTER flag to the DrawText API.

seg-source.mrk: This prevents the control from passing the $DT_CENTER flag to the DrawText API.

target.mrk: This prevents the control from passing the $DT_CENTER flag to the DrawText API.
